title: Download error
body:
I have a friend who is trying to download on Mac, and he has downloaded the dmg file on Chrome. He then clicks to Open, which should  bring up a picture of Ryze in the background with League of Legends and the Applications folder, but when he tries to open it the application Photos opens and says "Nothing to Import, none of these files could be imported into your Photos library." He does not know what has happened, so could anyone give a suggestion? 
Thanks, ProWinner36

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you have your friend try the following steps

* Right-Click, or Control + Click on the DMG file, once it is fully downloaded. You will see a menu like this:

* Choose the "Open With" menu item, then "DiskImageMounter". After a few moments, depending on the size of the DMG file, you will see the mounted Disk Image show up on your Desktop.

* If it doesn't show, choose Other & navigate to...

> /System/Library/CoreServices/DiskImageMounter.app
Thanks very much, will see if it works.
